topicSummary: Hypertension is persistently raised arterial blood pressure (BP). It is one of several risk factors for diseases

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Hypertension - not diabetic: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Revised SPC for Istin (amlodipine) 5 and 10mg tablets. Drug interactions updated as per the revised SPC.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed and updated
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in May 2017 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. The topic has undergone restructuring. No major changes to the recommendations have been made.
